title: Old Versions
body: I'm sure that this isn't possible to have as an available feature nor would it really be allowed the public to do this but, its worth a shot to see. I would just like to know that, is there a possibility of which we could download and play the original version of league (as to when league was first released) and to change the versions of the game to play (solo or with mates on that current version) to test and discover the roots of league and to experiment all of the past features. I believe that it would be very enjoyable and entertaining learning experience into the base game and all the changes (both major and/or minor) throughout the years. A sort of blast to the past kind of experience. I truly believe that, even though this is currently not a thing, it would be a great feature for a great experience. (Even though you probably don't have the original versions of the game any more and i am seeming as though a completely silly person xD).

replies.body:
I support this wholeheartedly. Perhaps there could be like, a set time for these like for a week where every day is a different Season even though this would be really really REALLY hard to implement




I miss Season 2 :'(

Same here man season 2 and 3 were the glory days.

Aside from the fact that this will never happen or be permitted from a 3rd party perspective, I'd play the shit out of old versions of the game. Season 6 is without a doubt the shittest season so far.
S3 was so fun, the games were either really fast paced or everyone has 4000 HP.
great idea :D it would be awesome to get that original league experience!
well, you could edit the game files to get custom stuff...switching champion splashes is pretty easy

This idea is great, I actually posted something similar to this and so many people disagreed with me and i'm glad that this one has many supporters in it. I really miss season 3-4 where league was basically at it's peak without all the new BS features like remake and stuff. It was also at that time where jungle monsters weren't even that strong.
That would make an awesome featured game mode, have the old map and only the original champions with their original looks/abilities/stats
Original items and everything would be like omg yes hit me with that shard of true ice
Back when you could stack BTs on Aatrox omg that was the funniest thing
I reckon this is a great idea, would love to see it live as it would bring back many of those nostalgic moments.
